title: African American support for Dem. party - why

content.question: During the 1930s Black voters overwhelmingly switched from the Republican Party to the Democratic Party because

choices.label: Black Americans benefited from some New Deal economic policies
the Ku Klux Klan was gaining power within the Republican Party
President Roosevelt actively pursued race reform
southern Democrats widely favored abolishing the poll tax
the Democrats promised to end Prohibition

content.answer: Black Americans benefited from some New Deal economic policies

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
